title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/annademeanour-gidisu.html
notes: Miss Anna Demeanour has a short attention span, which makes it hard to keep a Lad on the line. She has fun, though.

messages.body:
Featuring:
, 1st "banker"
, the very same

Anna receives a confusing message.
messages.raw:
Featuring:
JOE GIDISU, 1st "banker"
ANNA DEMEANOUR, the very same

Anna receives a confusing message.

messages.subject: <<<Urgent>>>
messages.body:
Reply-To: jgidisu@joegidisu.com


I have a legitimate transaction that is of great worth, But i need an overseas representative to finalise transaction, Can you promise safety of my share of the worths, if this is done with you!
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

From: mike.cox@homecall.co.uk
Date: June 12, 2010
To: nley@homecall.co.uk
Subject: <<<Urgent>>>
Reply-To: jgidisu@joegidisu.com

I have a legitimate transaction that is of great worth, But i need an overseas representative to finalise transaction, Can you promise safety of my share of the worths, if this is done with you!

messages.body:
Well that didn't reflect much effort. But he has his own domain name, which is intriguing.
It's registered through Name.com LLC.
Registrant contact information: Net Regime Solutions, Accra, Ghana
The server itself (joegidisu.com) is apparently hosted by Gnax.net, Atlanta (64.22.69.29)
It's a bare-bones page with a list of files:


Index of /
	-cgi-bin/
	-images/
	-joegidisuproposal.pdf
	-postinfo.html


The server is chatty about itself:	
Apache/2.2.15 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.15 OpenSSL/0.9.7a mod_auth_passthrough/2.1 mod_bwlimited/1.4 FrontPage/5.0.2.2635 Server at joegidisu.com Port 80


Presumably, "joegidisuproposal.pdf" is the scam-o-document.
I have not yet been invited to look at it, but I do, anyway. 
It says:


Mr. Joe Gidisu, 
Minister for Roads and Highways 
Accra Ghana . 
Attn, 
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail. With my position as Minister for Roads 
and Highways Accra Ghana, the said funds are residue of over invoiced contract sum 
executed by various companies, the companies that supplied these items for the road 
(ACHIMOTA ROAD) have already been paid out as we agreed to left with the balance 
of this US$ 5,500,000.00 (Fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars) 
which will be transferred to an account that will be provided by you. The whole legal 
back up documents shall be forwarded to the bank to give this deal a legal statusas one of 
the contractor that supplied the items. 
The committee which I head intends paying all outstanding balance to the contractors as 
we are winding up our activities since the aim of setting up the committee is almost 
concluded, so that is the reason why I contacted you . What I need is to transfer the funds 
to your designated account as one of the contractor that supplied the items for the said 
contract instead of losing the remaining funds to Government. 
I am 51 years old born in TEMA-Ghana with 4 children, two boys and two girls, and I 
would like to know more about you also, your profession, address and telephone number 
to make sure of whom IÕm dealing with before given you the bank website to proceed 
with the transfer as the rightful owner of the said funds. 
As an account owner for this transfer, You will be entitled to 40% of the total fund (US$ 
15,500,000.00), 10% will be set aside to take care of any incidental charges which might 
arise in the course of the transaction While the balance 50% will be for my investment in 
your country. I want to re-assure you that this transaction is 100% risk free as it has been 
covered from any act of enquiry from whatsoever. 
I will not directly be involved in this transaction due to my position and to avoid 
suspicious from my people. ThatÕs the reason why I contacted you to stand-in as the 
rightful owner of the funds and instruct the bank to transfer the funds to your designated 
account abroad. 
Please I do not need a joker therefore if you are not going to participate full in this 
transaction; you are free to say NO now that the transaction has not started as Iwill not 
like any disappointment in between the transaction rather lets us be ordinary friends .We 
have to do everything to protect this deal as here lies our future. 
Awaiting to hear from you soon. 
Honorably yours, 
Mr. Joe Gidisu, 


Your basic "over-invoiced account" '419' format.
There is a real Joe Gidisu - the Ghanaian Minister for Roads and Highways.
This (Lad) isn't him. But you knew that.

Awaiting to hear from you soon.
Honorably yours,
Mr. Joe Gidisu,

Your basic "over-invoiced account" '419' format.
There is a real Joe Gidisu - the Ghanaian Minister for Roads and Highways.
This (Lad) isn't him. But you knew that.

ANNA DEMEANOUR

[I guess the "proposal" above is what I'll get from him if I reply. So I reply:]

Yeh sure whatever ?

messages.body:
6/14, 3:15am


Re: Details...
From:	
"jgidisu@joegidisu.com" 


MY PLEASURE,


This is a proposal in context but actually an appeal soliciting for your
unreserved assistance in consummating an urgent transaction requiring
maximum confidence.


My name is Mr. Joe Gidisu Chief Credit Officer (CCO), IFCA RESOURCES GHANA
LTD/ MINISTRY FOR ROADS AND HIGHWAYS ACCRA, GHANA. On December 6, 2002, a
foreign consultant/contractor Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson  , made a numbered
time (Fixed) Deposit for twelve calendar months, valued at Fifteen Million
Five Hundred Thousand, United States Dollars in my branch. Upon maturity,
I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply.
After a month, I sent a reminder and finally we discovered from his
contract employers, that Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson died from an automobile
accident .On further investigation, I found out that he died without
making a Will, and all attempts to trace his next of kin was fruitless. I
therefore made further investigation and discovered that Mr. Seung-Yeoul
Johnson did not declare any next of kin or relations in all his official
documents, including his Bank Deposit paperwork in our Bank.


From past experiences, I know that no one will ever come forward to claim
the deceased funds. According to Ghana Law, at the expiration of 5 (five)
years, the funds will be unclaimable and revert to the ownership of the
Ghana Government as contribution to the Defense ministry if nobody applies
to claim the fund. In order to avert this development, I in conjunction
with a colleague (the Foreign Remittance Manager in the bank) now seek
your permission to allow an attorney do a backdated WILL in your name, so
that the funds would be released to you as the new owner (on behalf of me
and my colleague). We are writing you because, citizens resident here we
cannot operate a foreign account or have an account that is more than
50,000ghc.Consequently; I will present you as the owner of the funds so
you can be able to claim it on our behalf with the help of an attorney.


This is simple. I will like you to provide immediately your: FULL
NAME/FULL CONTACT ADDRESS/PHONE/FAX NUMBERS, so that an Attorney will
prepare the necessary documents which will put you in place as the
beneficiary of the funds. The money will then be released to your custody
or your designated bank account by the bank, for us to share in the ratio
of 60% for us and 40% for you. There is no risk at all as all the
paperwork for this transaction will be done by the Attorney and this will
guarantee the successful execution of this transaction. If you are
interested, please reply immediately via my email address.


No doubt this proposal will make you apprehensive, please I employ you to
observe utmost confidentiality and rest assured that this transaction
would be most profitable for both of us. This is why your urgent action
and response is of priority to enable us wrap up this transaction as soon
as possible.


Thanks and regards.
Mr. Joe Gidisu.
Chief Credit Officer (CCO).
IFCA RESOURCES GH.LTD.
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

6/14, 3:15am

Re: Details...
From: "jgidisu@joegidisu.com"

MY PLEASURE,

This is a proposal in context but actually an appeal soliciting for your unreserved assistance in consummating an urgent transaction requiring maximum confidence.

My name is Mr. Joe Gidisu Chief Credit Officer (CCO), IFCA RESOURCES GHANA LTD/ MINISTRY FOR ROADS AND HIGHWAYS ACCRA, GHANA. On December 6, 2002, a foreign consultant/contractor Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson , made a numbered time (Fixed) Deposit for twelve calendar months, valued at Fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand, United States Dollars in my branch. Upon maturity, I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply. After a month, I sent a reminder and finally we discovered from his contract employers, that Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson died from an automobile accident .On further investigation, I found out that he died without making a Will, and all attempts to trace his next of kin was fruitless. I therefore made further investigation and discovered that Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson did not declare any next of kin or relations in all his official documents, including his Bank Deposit paperwork in our Bank.

From past experiences, I know that no one will ever come forward to claim the deceased funds. According to Ghana Law, at the expiration of 5 (five) years, the funds will be unclaimable and revert to the ownership of the Ghana Government as contribution to the Defense ministry if nobody applies to claim the fund. In order to avert this development, I in conjunction with a colleague (the Foreign Remittance Manager in the bank) now seek your permission to allow an attorney do a backdated WILL in your name, so that the funds would be released to you as the new owner (on behalf of me and my colleague). We are writing you because, citizens resident here we cannot operate a foreign account or have an account that is more than 50,000ghc.Consequently; I will present you as the owner of the funds so you can be able to claim it on our behalf with the help of an attorney.

This is simple. I will like you to provide immediately your: FULL NAME/FULL CONTACT ADDRESS/PHONE/FAX NUMBERS, so that an Attorney will prepare the necessary documents which will put you in place as the beneficiary of the funds. The money will then be released to your custody or your designated bank account by the bank, for us to share in the ratio of 60% for us and 40% for you. There is no risk at all as all the paperwork for this transaction will be done by the Attorney and this will guarantee the successful execution of this transaction. If you are interested, please reply immediately via my email address.

No doubt this proposal will make you apprehensive, please I employ you to observe utmost confidentiality and rest assured that this transaction would be most profitable for both of us. This is why your urgent action and response is of priority to enable us wrap up this transaction as soon as possible.

Thanks and regards.
Mr. Joe Gidisu.
Chief Credit Officer (CCO).
IFCA RESOURCES GH.LTD.

This is supposed to be an over-invoiced contract scam (which I know from his web site).
Now he's giving with the dead bank customer scam.
And is he pretending to be a Minister or a corporate officer?

messages.body:
This is the details of my proposal.  http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf


Joe Gidisu.
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

[And he immediately follows up with:]

This is the details of my proposal. http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf

Joe Gidisu.

[Surprise, surprise.]

messages.body:
Thank you for your kind response, This is the details of my proposal. 
http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf

Joe Gidisu.
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

[He jogs me later the same day:]

Thank you for your kind response, This is the details of my proposal.
http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf

Joe Gidisu.

messages.body:
Yeah yeah I looked at it.
You said some guy died. But this document says there's an over invoiced contract.
It doesn't mention the dead guy.
What's an over invoiced contract anyways? Over to you.
messages.raw:
ANNA DEMEANOUR
Yeah yeah I looked at it.
You said some guy died. But this document says there's an over invoiced contract.
It doesn't mention the dead guy.
What's an over invoiced contract anyways? Over to you.

messages.body:
6/17


Below is what i sent you previously .


This is the details of my proposal.  http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf


Joe Gidisu.

JOE GIDISU

[So he emails me back the same exact thing:]

6/17

Below is what i sent you previously .

This is the details of my proposal. http://joegidisu.com/proposals.pdf

Joe Gidisu.

messages.body:

Good Day.


I have not heard back from you to enable me know my next step? WhatÕs on

I will wait for your timely response.


Mr. Joe

Mr. Joe

messages.body:
6/18


Like I said, I looked at it.
In your first email you mentioned some business deal.
Then you mention this dead guy.
What's up with that?
As for the next step, you tell me.
messages.raw:
ANNA DEMEANOUR

6/18

Like I said, I looked at it.
In your first email you mentioned some business deal.
Then you mention this dead guy.
What's up with that?
As for the next step, you tell me.

messages.body:
Re: Re Re :<<<Agreement to sign>>


AGREEMENT mr.gidisu ..doc (31KB)
Good day.


I received your email and the contents are well noted.


Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson was a contractor and most of our politicians here
in Ghana are using the man to move funds out of the country because of his
reputation.


Thus the fund in question was over contract invoice which one of the
politicians gave him to deposit with his name to avoid trace.


Unfortunately the man died without next of kin.  So the fund has been in
our company for many years since nobody knows about it.


Open the attach document to sign and send back to me to enable me direct
you how to contact our bank for onward transfer of the funds to your
designated account .


Cordially yours.


Mr. Joe
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

Re: Re Re :<<<Agreement to sign>>

AGREEMENT mr.gidisu ..doc (31KB)
Good day.

I received your email and the contents are well noted.

Mr. Seung-Yeoul Johnson was a contractor and most of our politicians here in Ghana are using the man to move funds out of the country because of his reputation.

Thus the fund in question was over contract invoice which one of the politicians gave him to deposit with his name to avoid trace.

Unfortunately the man died without next of kin. So the fund has been in our company for many years since nobody knows about it.

Open the attach document to sign and send back to me to enable me direct you how to contact our bank for onward transfer of the funds to your designated account .

Cordially yours.

Mr. Joe

messages.body:
Re: Re Re : <<<Let Us Discuss>>


	

Good Day .


I have not heard back from you , could you tell me what's on your mind to
enable me move forward?


Thanks
Mr.Joe
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU
Re: Re Re : <<<Let Us Discuss>>

Good Day .

I have not heard back from you , could you tell me what's on your mind to enable me move forward?

Thanks
Mr.Joe

messages.body:
I've been busy. Got your email, read the document. Had to laugh.
Come on, tell me the truth. Maybe we can do 'business'.
I don't work with amateurs. You sound like a small boy.
messages.raw:
ANNA DEMEANOUR

[There are so many inconsistencies I could quibble about, but I bore easily.]

I've been busy. Got your email, read the document. Had to laugh.
Come on, tell me the truth. Maybe we can do 'business'.
I don't work with amateurs. You sound like a small boy.

[Probably blown it now.]

messages.body:
Pretty good then .


Thanks for your maturity though .


We can't do business , how about that ? does it make you laugh aswell .


Have a great day
Mr.Joe
messages.raw:
JOE GIDISU

[Yup.]

Pretty good then .

Thanks for your maturity though .

We can't do business , how about that ? does it make you laugh aswell .

Have a great day
Mr.Joe

heh heh

ANNA DEMEANOUR

[Neh, I'm not all that mature.]

July 2

Yeh, heh heh

heh heh

Enjoying the World Cup?

[Too bad about Ghana. They played great.]

[That's probably that. The web site's still up, though, if anyone else wants to have a go.]

 

scamorama main street * get booked *
